Decorations.name: Table
Decorations.desc: Found in taverns, inns, or dining areas, these items create spaces for role-playing interactions, resting, or tactical positioning during combat encounters.

Decorations.name: Chair
Decorations.desc: Provide seating for role-playing interactions, resting, or tactical positioning during combat encounters.

Decorations.name: Bed
Decorations.desc: Found in taverns, inns, or bedrooms, these items create spaces for role-playing interactions, resting, or tactical positioning during combat encounters.

Decorations.name: Potted Plants
Decorations.desc: Plants suspended from ceilings, adding a natural and refreshing element to interiors.

Storages.name: Barrel
Storages.desc: Commonly found in storage areas, warehouses, or dungeons. May contain supplies, loot, or even hidden passages.

Storages.name: Bookshelf
Storages.desc: Can be placed in libraries, wizard towers, or study rooms. May hold valuable books with lore, spells, or hints for quests.

Storages.name: Cabinet
Storages.desc: Commonly found in storage areas, warehouses, or dungeons. May contain supplies, or loot.

Storages.name: Crate
Storages.desc: Commonly found in storage areas, warehouses, or dungeons. May contain supplies, loot, or even hidden passages.

Environmental Details.name: Cobwebs
Environmental Details.desc: In abandoned areas or long-forgotten chambers, these details set the tone for mystery and neglect.

Environmental Details.name: Dust
Environmental Details.desc: In abandoned areas or long-forgotten chambers, these details set the tone for mystery and neglect.

Environmental Details.name: Runes
Environmental Details.desc: Engraved on walls or floors, these symbols can be clues or trigger magical effects when activated.

Environmental Details.name: Glyphs
Environmental Details.desc: Engraved on walls or floors, these symbols can be clues or trigger magical effects when activated.

Environmental Details.name: Banners
Environmental Details.desc: Decorating the walls of castles, guild halls, or fortresses, these items add character to the locations.

Environmental Details.name: Tapestries
Environmental Details.desc: Decorating the walls of castles, guild halls, or fortresses, these items add character to the locations.

Atmospheric Elements.name: Candles
Atmospheric Elements.desc: Candles placed in decorative holders, providing both illumination and ambiance to the surroundings.

Atmospheric Elements.name: Fireplace
Atmospheric Elements.desc: Provides warmth and ambiance in cold environments. Players can gather around for comfort or strategic planning.

Atmospheric Elements.name: Hearth
Atmospheric Elements.desc: An area around the fireplace that serves as a gathering point for warmth and comfort. Players can strategize and interact.

Atmospheric Elements.name: Steam Vents
Atmospheric Elements.desc: Vents that release hot steam and can be used strategically in combat or puzzle-solving.

Atmospheric Elements.name: Frozen Statues
Atmospheric Elements.desc: Statues covered in ice, which players can melt to reveal hidden passages or items.

Treasure Hoards.name: Jeweled Chest
Treasure Hoards.desc: An laborate chest filled with valuable treasures, guarded by monsters or traps.

Treasure Hoards.name: Golden Altar
Treasure Hoards.desc: An altar adorned with gold and gems that require offerings or rituals to gain rewards.

Treasure Hoards.name: Pouch of Gems
Treasure Hoards.desc: A tiny sack containing scattered gems throughout the map, valuable as trade items or components for magical rituals.

Treasure Hoards.name: Gem of Seeing
Treasure Hoards.desc: A gem that allows truesight out to 120 feet when you peer through the gem.
